## Checklist

* [ ] Code compiles and tests pass locally with `poetry run pytest`
* [ ] Linting passes with `make lint` or equivalent
* [ ] If this pull request touches ingestion, `poetry run gle-gate0` was run and the result is understood
* [ ] Documentation updated if behavior or commands changed

## Gate zero awareness

For features beyond pure ingestion

* [ ] I have checked the current `docs/gate0_report.md`
* [ ] I confirm that this change does not move the project into modeling or heavy feature work before Gate zero is satisfied
